title.rendered: Applicature Enters into Partnership with Gate to Baltics to Provide Legal Support to Blockchain Projects

content.rendered:
San Francisco, California (November 7, 2019) – Applicature, a blockchain development agency, is pleased to announce a new partnership with GATE TO BALTICS, an international law firm in Estonia, to ensure legal support and licensing process guidance for blockchain projects.

In the context of this agreement, the parties will collaborate on blockchain solutions, combining the expertise of the Applicature team with the legal protection provided by Gate to Baltics.

Applicature will drive solid blockchain-based projects to the legal marketplace to effectively incorporate and manage businesses by professional consultants and corporate lawyers at Gate to Baltics. 

The partnership between Applicature and Gate to Baltics will accelerate companies on their ICO/STO path with streamlined solutions from a legal perspective, thereby addressing the challenges of modern blockchain development.

“Governments, large institutions, and transnational corporations are recognizing the power of blockchain. Simple and inexpensive compliance worldwide is only a matter of time! Estonia is becoming a leader in blockchain adoption and regulation, and we are committed to cooperating with Gate to Baltics to offer our clients a crypto-friendly domicile and legal support.” — Ian Arden, CEO of Applicature.

With well experienced and educated team, Gate to Baltics has onsite experience with the relocation of legal entities and is aware of the challenges commonly faced in such processes. 

The goal is to foster a solid entrepreneurial formation for companies by analyzing ICO and STO legal requirements and establishing strategy for customers with regard to ICO or STO launches in the European Union. 

“We are happy to start our partnership with Applicature because from day one they seemed like professionals in blockchain area. Before every partnership we evaluate the following aspects: honesty, attention to details, and potential to reach new markets. Applicature has all the above mentioned characteristics, and I believe that our partnership will bring mutual success and provide global reach to our services.” – Reinis Sietins, CEO of Gate to Baltics. 

About Applicature

Applicature is a blockchain development agency. The Applicature team works on projects in the blockchain industry involving the development of smart contacts and the research, deployment, and customization of blockchain solutions. Applicature serves as a technical advisory to blockchain companies and as a technical consultancy for token offerings.

Having been involved in over 100 projects, Applicature offers an elaborate framework that includes proofs of concept, launching DeFi projects, MVPs, and smart-contract audits across a wide spectrum of industries: fintech, supply chain, healthcare, arts and collectibles, digital rights, and loyalty distribution, real estate, ticketing and events, and more.

 

Medium Blog: https://medium.com/@Applicature

Email: info@applicature.com

About GATE TO BALTICS:

GATE TO BALTICS has specialized in corporate law and management consulting services in Estonia and Latvia since 2013. During this time, the company has gained significant experience and created strong teams in Latvia and Estonia. In addition,  Gate to Baltics assists customers in obtaining licenses for business operations.

Areas of practice:

  • Company formation in Estonia & Latvia
  • Legal expertise in Blockchain
  • Market research
  • Presentation training
  • ICO/STO legal analysis in the EU
  • Trademark Registration with EUIPO

To learn more, please visit: https://www.gatetobaltics.com/

Email: info@gatetobaltics.com
